attributes.action: make a concerted effort to make all our prisons drug-free
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Prison provides an ideal environment for offenders, many of whom will have committed crimes to feed a drug habit, to completely de-tox in what is supposed to be an alcohol- and drug-free environment.

It cannot be beyond this Government to ensure all prisons are made completely drug-free. 

If this means visitors only seeing prisoners through glass screens, regular drug screening of prisoners, and severe punishment and more frequent investigation of prison officers found to be bringing drugs into the prison system, so be it. 

Prison can never been an effective deterrent, punishment OR offer any sort of rehabilition when drugs are freely available in them.
